data.name: Midnight Stories 2
data.detailed_description:
Disclaimer - The characters in this game are all over 18 years old. They are adults (grown-up). The content of this game is purely fictitious and has no intention of showing or describing any real event, character or entity. If identical, it is purely coincidental.

Midnight Stories

The game starts with Cindy, when she's 19 years old. The concept of the game is that Cindy drives the story, but a lot of other characters / pairs
For example: Episode 01 is a party where Cindy and Michelle get together, and side stories: Cindy and Lloyd and 1st pair Nadine and Justin.

Features:
- 4k ultra HD images
- completely voiced episodes
- (after AUG 2021) 2x images with option to choose your camera: far / close up / rear / above camera for each step
- more SFX (ambience, actor gigs, folly) and music
- images with a lot of figures and props
- as of 07-AUG, a total of 2,291 images and some animations

As of 07-AUG, incl. DLC2 has next to the main story, this erotic scenes, with full voice over:
- EP01 - Cindy and Michelle, Cindy and Lloyd, Nadine and Justin
- EP02 Cindy and Michelle
- EP03 Cindy and Michelle

In Extra - Cindy is 22 years and the erotic scenes have some animations, but only sometimes voice over:
- Extra Scene - Cindy, Ash and Muscle Guy
- Extra Scene - Cindy and Ash
- Extra Scene - Ash and Justin
- Extra Scene - Cindy and Amalia
- Extra Scene - Justin and Lucy
- Extra Scene - Ash and Devon
- Extra Scenes (short) - Cindy and Ash, Devon and Caroline, Justin and Sara and Dee, Amalia and Lucy
- Extra Scene - Cindy and Justin
- Extra Scene - Jim and Cindy
- Extra Scene - Cindy and Zac
- Extra Scene - Ash and Eredin
- Extra Scene - erotic games in situations with a lot of choices and (hopefully) fun

Summary:
The game contains: 50,255 words and 2,291 images.

data.short_description: This game has three erotic episodes and features multiple voice selection, a multitude of options and game path, animations and 4K renders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.
